Here's some Wolverine chalk art I made for my local theater.

WRITING.TEXT: Thank you! Took awhile but it was fun to make.

WRITING.TITLE: In honor of Rogue One, I thought I share my chalk drawing I made with you guys.
Doctor Strange chalk art I made.

WRITING.TEXT: Cool just let me know what you want, the size, and color or black and white. Try and give me as detailed of a description as possible and then we can work out a price.
I could definitely make something for you if you'd be interested in that
I definitely do requests! Pm me and we can discuss it
YOU GET A DOLLAR , YOU GET A DOLLAR, YOU GET A DOLLAR, EVERYBODY GETS A DOLLAR!!!

WRITING.TITLE: My best friend wanted to me to make them a little Lebowski family.
A family portrait of my friends, colored pencil, 18" x 24"
/r/dragondrawings told me to post this here

WRITING.TEXT: She adored it! Hoping when her daughter grows up she'll recognize it as either her or her mom.

Sorry, I guess I was mislead by the large amount of posts people have shared of their own personal work. I guess the next time I'm proud of my artwork, I'll keep it on different platform. Thanks for the input though, I must have a lot to learn about the internet, and apparently drawing people as well.

WRITING.TITLE: A little queen and her dragon
For my friend's baby shower, I drew her as a princess with a pet dragon.
